text: @senatemajldr @SenateGOP & other @GOP should've targeted COVID-19 from start, not living another reality with @realDonaldTrump. U.S.A SHOULD'VE been leaders in the world against COVID-19, instead we go down in history as failing. Get COVID-19 under control 1st, we're still failing if not.
